name: Star Boss
description: Become a big pilot of a tiny spaceship. Fight bigger opponents and prove that size does not matter. Exploit weaknesses of opponents. Get the edge thanks to the range of super weapons.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 2GHz Dual-Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with 1GB memory Storage: 800 MB available space
